raw_body: LABROOY – JUDE – (Lake House) – At rest with Jesus. Dearly beloved husband of Mallika,​ darling father of Dilan,​ loving son of late Duke Labrooy and Maurinne Labrooy,​ brother of Gillian,​ Radley and Sandra,​ bother-in-law of Saman,​ Inoka and Keith,​ expired. Remains lie at his residence: 187/​16C,​ Suraweera Mawatha,​ Walpola from 8 a.m. on 05th December. Cortege leaves residence at 3.00 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.00 p.m. on 06.12.2023. (Australian papers please copy).080542
